message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the possibility of doing business together. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $850000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. After re-evaluating, I'm willing to offer you the product for $825000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $825000 is still above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $775000. After re-evaluating, I'm willing to offer you the product for $800000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your persistence, but $800000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product at this price.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand your commitment to buying the product, but I'm not willing to budge from my previous offer. After re-evaluating, I'm willing to offer you the product for $795000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to sell the product at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $785000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted. I believe this price is fair considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product at this price.
